Message.Title: what is the advantage and disadvantage
Message.Msg: between regular phone plan and Prepaid phone plan? I heard quite numbers of people are not happy with regular phone plans especially from AT&T. People switch the prepaid plans told me that they are happy the prepaid because it is cheaper with unlimited talk, text and data for just $50/month for the first line and $40 for second line. With prepaid you don't tie up with the contract and you are free to find any unlocked GSM phone you want. Net10 Prepaid said their plans are better because they are cheaper and they use the same towers as all the largest providers like ATT and Verizon. If that is the case, why would anyone including me killing ourselves for ATT regular phone plan. RIght now I have 2 phone, one with talk, text and 200 Mg data and one with just talk and text costs me
